Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.model

Class BoardManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.model.BoardManager
public class BoardManager
extends java.lang.Object
A class containing the main info about the game, such as the island, the list of the players and the cards, to make them easy accessible from the controller package

      Throws:

    • takeCard

      public void takeCard​(CardEnum card) throws InvalidCardException
      Takes a cards from the selected ones and adds it to the taken one
      Parameters:
      card - the card chosen by one player that should be added to the list selectedCards
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - if the card passed as input is not in the card list
